description.text: A complete password manager app bult with React JS, TypeScrpt, and Material UI for the frontend, and Laravel with MySQL as the backend. Ths app includes role managements for users, premium functions, payments handling wth PayPal and Coinbase. The app synchronizes all the stored passwords of the users across al the users' registered devices.
